Class RootController

  • java.lang.Object

public class RootController
extends WombatController
    Handles requests to the application root.

    • Method Detail

      • home

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
            throws Exception
        Show a page in response to the application root.

        This is here only for development/debugging: if you browse to the application root while you're setting up, this page is more useful than an error message. But all end-user-facing pages should belong to one of the sites in siteSet.

        Throws:
        Exception
